title: Strategies to Overcome Barriers in Utilizing Learning Design Tools in Mobile Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: A program for pre-service professionals in language education conducted in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain three key features of learning design tools in mobile environments.
Learners can present two strategies for applying learning design tools under technological constraints.
Learners can conduct a project analyzing tool adoption barriers using a mixed-methods research approach (literature analysis + case study).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
